Much like the well-known Tom H. C. Anderson once achieved (www.tomhcanderson.com), Sean strives for his blog (www.seancopeland.me) to be the top personal blog dedicated to market research in terms of both overall traffic and unique monthly visitors. On LinkedIn and on Twitter, he shares stories from the top market research news sites and also shares insightful discussions from his own personal blog.
